name: Another Zombie Game (ChinChen)
description:
You and your friends are trapped into abandoned house in the middle of the field. Your only protection against zombies is the special generator, that you should protect.  

If it will destroyed, you are doomed..

Use you reputation for get supplies through airdrops.

And don't forget to sleep!

This game is kind of challenge for me. I wanted to make game using only free content from Internet, with the exception of code. Thx opengameart.org and Epic Games.

You can donate if you want me to continue develop this one.
